text: Rainbow Road may refer to: *Rainbow Road (New Zealand), a back-country road from Hanmer Springs to Saint Arnaud *Rainbow Road, the final course in each of the Mario Kart series of video games *Rainbow Road, a 2005 novel by Alex Sanchez *"Rainbow Road" (song), written by Donnie Fritts and Dan Penn, recorded by several musicians, including Steve Goodman, Arthur Alexander, and Joan Baez *"Rainbow Road" (album), a 2010 album by Haruka Tomatsu
title: Rainbow Road
